name: Ocrolus
description: Ocrolus is a document AI platform that enables faster and more accurate financial decision-making. The company analyzes documents with over 99% accuracy, regardless of format or quality, supporting hundreds of document types including bank statements, pay stubs, and tax forms. Ocrolus provides a trusted solution to detect fraud, analyze cash flows and income, and streamline decisions for 400+ clients. Use-cases range from small business, mortgage, and consumer lending to tax preparation and Medicaid eligibility. Customers such as Enova, PayPal, Brex, CrossCountry Mortgage, Plaid, and SoFi leverage Ocrolus automation to build delightful user-experiences
features: We offer a comprehensive health package, including dental and vision, to support your physical and mental wellbeing.
Be empowered to grow personally and professionally with our annual learning and development stipend.
It’s important that Ocrolus employees feel invested in the company. Equity packages are available to most staff.
Headline: Ocrolus is a document AI platform that enables faster and more accurate financial decision-making.
ShortDescription: Ocrolus believe companies work best when they focus on their core business and let automation take care of the rest.
enhanced_description: Ocrolus is a document AI platform designed to enable faster and more accurate financial decision-making. The platform analyzes documents with over 99% accuracy, regardless of format or quality, supporting hundreds of document types including bank statements, pay stubs, and tax forms. It provides a trusted solution for clients to detect fraud, analyze cash flows and income, and streamline decisions. Ocrolus's automation allows companies to focus on their core business, serving use-cases across small business, mortgage, and consumer lending, as well as tax preparation and Medicaid eligibility. Prominent customers include Enova, PayPal, Brex, CrossCountry Mortgage, Plaid, and SoFi, who leverage Ocrolus to build delightful user-experiences.
competitive_advantages: Ability to process documents regardless of format or quality
Support for hundreds of document types
integration_capabilities: API integrations (inferred from Plaid customer mention)
roi_benefits: Optimized resource allocation by enabling focus on core business
